MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH64 postcode area of Neston, affecting properties in Hinderton Lane, Chester High Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at5:24PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30PM. We will update this message if the information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:30PM on Sunday 13th December 2020
